topics.title: Community Vote Results and Mishaps
topics.summary: QX apologizes for missing kushti's Bitcoin relay project in the community vote and announces 6,700 ERGs will be distributed to winners. Sigmanauts are now voting on distribution methods.

topics.title: Rosen BTC Bridge Goes Live
topics.summary: Rosen BTC bridge launched on Friday with recent fixes for watcher nodes. QX successfully tested BTC mining payouts through the Sigmanauts mining pool using the bridge.

topics.title: Trade House Order Book DEX Launch
topics.summary: Trade House, an order book DEX from Auction House team, is now live allowing users to create custom liquidity pairs with configurable fees. Currently supports limit orders only.

topics.title: Nautilus Wallet Rewrite and Security Features
topics.summary: Captain Nemo released Abyss, a rewritten version of Nautilus wallet for Chrome store compliance. Features include community-run blacklist for scam/NSFW tokens with automatic filtering.

topics.title: ErgoHack Project Showcase
topics.summary: ErgoHack featured exceptional projects including Crystal Pools, random number generator, Moria Finance for multi-sig automation, and DuckPools. Projects demonstrated innovative UTXO applications.

topics.title: Multi-sig Contract Builder Without Coding
topics.summary: kushti announces a breakthrough allowing creation of multi-signature and timelock contracts without coding knowledge. This capability is unique compared to EVM chains due to Ergo's UTXO model.

topics.title: Ergoversary Event Announcement
topics.summary: Ergoversary event announced featuring videos from academia and Nervos R&D, plus two Twitter Spaces on proof of work future and Ergo's five-year development roadmap.

topics.title: Rosen EVM Bridge Development Status
topics.summary: EVM codebase is nearly ready pending testing and setup ceremony. This will enable stable coins from Ethereum, Uniswap listings, and create a bridge between Cardano and EVM chains through Ergo.

topics.title: Palmyra Platform Updates and Announcements
topics.summary: Dan teases upcoming Palmyra announcements in 6 hours featuring new innovative tooling. Public sale starts June 24th with ERG referral bonuses and discussions of synthetic commodities development.

topics.title: Trade House Contract Security Review
topics.summary: kushti reviews Trade House contracts and encourages usage, noting potential for arbitrage between Spectrum and Trade House. Contracts are straightforward and based on 2018 order book designs.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Wallet Requirements
topics.summary: Discussion of Rosen Bridge requiring wallet connections rather than direct exchange addresses, currently using XDeFi for Bitcoin. Users express preference for Electrum support and self-custodial approaches.

topics.title: RSBTC Use Cases and Advantages
topics.summary: RSBTC can be used on SigmaFi, DuckPools, Spectrum, and Trade House for yield opportunities. Advantages over WBTC include transparent multi-sig security with watchers and guards having skin in the game.

topics.title: Watcher Node Setup and Requirements
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of becoming a watcher requiring 800 ERG and 33,000 Rosen tokens. Watchers monitor blockchain actions and file reports, receiving rewards after consensus confirmation.

topics.title: Security Implications of Rosen Market Cap
topics.summary: Discussion of what happens if Rosen market cap exceeds ERG's. kushti explains storage rent will eventually distribute Rosen to miners, and growing token values should benefit overall Ergo security.

topics.title: MiCA Regulations Impact on Crypto
topics.summary: European MiCA regulations will tighten compliance requirements including technical standards, clawbacks, and blacklisting capabilities. May drive adoption of assets with sound monetary policies when restrictions tighten.

topics.title: Mining Hardware Rental and Hash Rate Futures
topics.summary: Discussion of BlockX implementing Autolykos and hardware rental concepts. Sigmanauts exploring hash rate futures using NFTs and peer-to-peer mining arrangements between users in different electricity cost regions.
